
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
cell_cycle <- read.csv("cell_cycle_tidied.csv")
full_cell_cycle <- read.csv("control_manifold_allfeatures.csv")
```


## phase distributions

```{r}
cell_cycle %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x = phase))

full_cell_cycle %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x = phase))
```


## AGE DISTRIBUTIONS

```{r}
cell_cycle %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_boxplot(aes(y = age))

cell_cycle %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_density(aes(x = age))
```
```{r}
library("car")
qqPlot(cell_cycle$age)
```
